mapper.select: SELECT PM.ID AS ID, P.ID AS PROJECT_ID, P.PROJECT_NAME AS PROJECT_NAME, MP.ID AS MODLE_ID, MP.MODLE_PROTOTYPE_NAME AS MODLE_NAME, MP.MODLE_PROTOTYPE_DESCRIBE AS MODLE_DESCRIBE, PM.VERSION AS VERSION, V.VERSION_DESC AS VERSION_DESC, ( SELECT v1.VERSION FROM VERSION v1 WHERE V.MODLE_ID = PM.MODLE_ID AND V.VERSION_ID = v1.ID ) AS VERSION_NUM FROM PROJECT_MODLE PM,PROJECT P,MODLE_PROTOTYPE MP,VERSION V WHERE PM.PROJECT_ID = P.ID AND PM.MODLE_ID = MP.ID AND PM.VERSION=V.VERSION AND PM.MODLE_ID=V.MODLE_ID AND PM.ID=#{id}
